prompts: Create an electric-type Pokemon with a sleek, agile body and striking yellow fur.
I want a legendary Pokemon that embodies the spirit of thunder with majestic features.
Generate a Pokemon design that showcases vibrant blue and yellow colors with dynamic movement.
Make a fierce quadrupedal creature that channels energy and speed through its electric abilities.
Imagine a mythical creature resembling a feline with powerful electric attacks and a bold stance.
Design a Pokemon that thrives in mountain habitats, showcasing its connection to storms and electricity.
Give me an electric Pokemon with a unique tail that resembles lightning, ready for battle.

distinctive_features: Long tail with a lightning motif
